tool_description: Identifies and analyzes comparable property sales within specified criteria including location, size, age, and property type to support valuation analysis.

property_type.description: Property type (single-family, condo, townhouse, commercial, etc.)

year_built.description: Year the subject property was built

search_radius.description: Search radius in miles for comparable properties

sale_date_range.description: Number of months back to search for sales

size_variance_percent.description: Allowable size variance percentage for comparables

max_comparables.description: Maximum number of comparable sales to return

error_messages: Invalid property address: The subject property address cannot be located or verified.
Invalid property type: Property type must be one of [single-family, condo, townhouse, duplex, commercial, industrial, land].
Invalid square footage: Square footage must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Search parameters out of range: search_radius must be 0.25-5.0 miles, sale_date_range must be 1-24 months, size_variance_percent must be 10-50%.
Insufficient comparable sales: Not enough comparable sales found with current criteria. Consider expanding search parameters.
Max comparables out of range: max_comparables must be between 3 and 50.
usage: Provide subject property details including address, type, and size. Optionally adjust search criteria to find the most relevant comparable sales for valuation analysis.

average_sale_price.description: Average sale price of comparable properties

price_per_sqft_range.description: Range of price per square foot values

comparable_sales.description: Details of each comparable sale including address, price, date, and key characteristics

market_trends.description: Analysis of pricing trends based on comparable sales
